findings.title: Minting of unlimited number of sundae tokens
findings.description: The mint function allows anyone to mint multiple tokens by paying for only one due to inadequate transfer of remaining ether back to the user.

findings.title: Broken mint() function logic allowing anyone to mint multiple tokens by paying for only one
findings.description: The mint function has a broken logic which allows users to mint multiple tokens by paying for only one. The issue lies in the inadequate transfer of remaining ether back to the user, leading to a scenario where users can buy any amount of tokens for a fixed msg.value.
